items.sentence: I didn't think anyone suspected you weren't Tom.
I think that Tom doesn't speak French very well.
I thought that the plan was to just talk to Tom.
I thought that you didn't have secrets from Tom.
Tom knows that you can't speak French very well.
Tom said he thought that he should study French.
Tom said he thought that he had to study French.
Tom said he thought that he had to speak French.
Tom said that he might not study French anymore.
Tom said that he doesn't speak French very well.
